page.title: 05RECREATION FOOTBALL LUTON
page.content: I play for a football club called Lewsey Centre. We play at St. Martin's Junior School. When I played in the 9-11 section there were 2 divisions, we played in the first against St.Josephs, Auckland, Hawthorns, Ramridge, Westoning and Sacred Heart. The first division was from the first two teams in each of several groups. We also won a 5-a-side tournament at Marsh House and we were runners-up to one at Millvale School. We all won little trophies and the team shared a big trophy. In the league St.Josephs were first, Auckland 2nd, Hawthorns 3rd, and Lewsey 4th. At the end of the season there is an Awards Night I was 2nd player of the year. We hope to play a Bicester team in August.Next year the Bernard Chiltern Sunday League will have 3 divisions new teams include Totternhoe and Woodstock.
